Articles.Content:
its there a way to remove this?

 

http://imgur.com/a/4I9ha

 

this part remanent its between my docking ports.

It looks like the base of a strut? If that's what it is, it shouldn't be causing a problem. Thank you for the picture, but this time we may actually need a .craft file of your lander to understand the problem.
Sometimes odd bits of separated junk disappear by shifting focus to the tracking station and then re-focusing on the craft. This re-loads a craft and usually not any nearby junk.
If you mean the strutt, you can instal KIS and KOS and send a kerbal to detach or replace the strut somewhere else.

Or there's always the Kerbal Way.  Collide it into something at a higher speed than its impact tolerance, to explode it! 

(Yeah, I know, not really practical, but it had to be said.  KIS is likely your best bet.)
